text: Orvon Grover Autry (September 29, 1907 â€“ October 2, 1998), better known as Gene Autry was an American movie actor and a singer. He was born in Tioga, Texas. He was also owner of a Major League Baseball team based in Los Angeles. His is best known for the song "Back in the Saddle Again" but he also performed many Christmas songs. Autry died of lymphoma in Studio City, Los Angeles, California. == Related pages == *List of country musicians from Texas == Other websites == * Category:National Radio Hall of Fame inductees Category:Actors from Texas Category:Country musicians from Texas Category:American movie actors Category:American movie producers Category:American radio personalities Category:Singer-songwriters from Texas Category:American television actors Category:American television producers Category:Deaths from lymphoma Category:1907 births Category:1998 deaths
title: Gene Autry
